ygData.subject: RE: PoF pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: It just needs to end in .topic (he got a space in there - add pic and it works) Sylly Songsynger ... From:	Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@loyalty.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
It just needs to end in ".topic" (he got a space in there - add pic and it
works)

Sylly Songsynger

-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 9:05 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] PoF pulling

From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>

Hey, this link doesn't work. Do you have this anywhere
else?


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: J.R. Hyde [mailto:jr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 15, 1999 6:02 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoF pulling


From: "J.R. Hyde" <jr@...>
Unfortunately, the training stuff away from the zone line
doesnt work,
matter of fact, it seems to have the opposite effect. Quite
a few people on
tunare had the same idea and yeah, i got picked for train
duty. I was quite
happy to do it though if it ment an easier breakin for
everybody else. I
basically did everything you suggested except i had no invis
(the idea was
to attract attention, not avoid it) and the end results
where disastrous. I
tried doing several patterns, sometimes running in circls
around the gate
hill and then running far off, othertimes just tagging the
stuff inbetween
the corner and the impt tower... etc. All of em resulted in
the same thing,
one full zone of uber pissed mobs looking for something to
kill. It just
made a big backlash that fell back with a mighty THWACK on
anybody that
tried to zone it or was in the corner. I lived plenty long
enough to get
stuff far away, matter of fact i made it to cazic himself
all but once
(tried punching him but everytime i got close he dt'd me
heh). Several
other people tried this including big ogre warriors, troll
sk's etc. End
result was all the same, just stirred everything up with out
sufficiently
clearing the corner/gate hill. I have a tutorial for safely
entering the
PoF at

http://server5.ezboard.com/ftunaredragonsandplanes.showMessage?topicID=91.to
pic, basically just a bunch of common sense. My bard and
necro both have a
flawless zone in record to the pof, and the bard got his
full suit of
imbrued before verant moved it to scorn banshees in the PoH.


I wish the train method worked, and i am not completly
ruling it out, if
you can figure out a way of making it work please SHARE =)

Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 Bard
Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 50 Necro
Colet Khrusallis, lvl 25 Cleric
Talisman - www.norrath.org
